#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n);
int main()
{
//     freopen("in","r",stdin);
    int test=0;
    cin>>test;
    int kase=0;
    while(test--)
    {
        kase++;
        int N;
        int M;
        cin>>N;
        cin>>M;
        vector<double> v(N,0);
        vector<int> v2(N,0);
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            cin>>v[i];
            v2[i]=(v[i]*100+0.001);
        }
 
 
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        sort(v2.begin(),v2.end());
        reverse(v.begin(),v.end());
        reverse(v2.begin(),v2.end());
 
        printf("Case %d:\n",kase);
        for(int i=0;i<M;i++)
        {
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
            double t;
            cin>>t;
            int tt=t*100+0.001;
            for(int j=0;j<N;j++)
            {
                int cnt=0;
                cnt=tt/v2[j];
                tt-=cnt*v2[j];
                if(cnt)
                {
                    if(int(v[j])==ceil(v[j]))
                        printf("%d %d\n",int(v[j]),cnt);
                    else
                        printf("%.2lf %d\n",v[j],cnt);
                }
            }
        }
    }
 
    return 0;
}
